items.translated_title: Elon Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI will face a jury in March

images.alt: In this photo illustration, the logo of 'OpenAI' is displayed on a mobile phone screen in front of a computer screen displaying the photograph of Elon Musk.

items.content: District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers said there was evidence suggesting OpenAI’s leaders made assurances that its original nonprofit structure would be maintained. The case will go to trial in March.
